alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gadsden, southeastern Decatur, Grady and northwestern Thomas Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Havana, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Cairo, Ochlocknee, Whigham, Attapulgus, Climax, Capel, Darsey, Jamieson, Harrells Still, Laingkat, Calvary, Princes Still, Peoples Still, Amsterdam, Quality, Branchville, Nickleville, Dogtown and Akridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
